name: Tır Kamyon Simulatoru
description:
Truck Simulator
Update 03.08.2017
In a long, extensive and comprehensive map, you can experience the realistic "trolley simulator" with real trolley models. With superb engine control and air braking systems, you can experience beautiful moments. 03.08.2017 With the update Garage and new tires are added to the Real Tire Simulator has been developed. You can earn gold by parking the TIR and access other trucks in the garage.

#umisoftgames
